page.title: 12A Llandudno Boy's Day.
page.content: My name is Anthony and my parents own a hotel in town. My day goes like this. I wake up about 6.45 a.m.to help my Mum. After carrying out the cereals and marmalade, I make the toast and put it on the tables. Then I have my own breakfast while Mum is grilling the bacon, frying the eggs and putt- ing them in the warm cupboard. Then it's time for me to go to school. When I come home for lunch she has cleaned the rooms, made the beds and is still working. After lunch, usually an omel- ette, I walk our dog. When I return after school, Mum is usually resting. When she wakes up it's time to start the evening meal, which is served at 6 pm. After the evening meal is over and everything is cleared up, Mum and Dad go to serve in the bar. I either go on my bike or practice the violin. .
